      1         2         3         4         5         6         7         8         9
19 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000

################### empty board:
#expected:0
19 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000
#expected:72
19 111000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 222000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000
#expected:18
19 111000000 000000000 000000000 222000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000



################### non empty board:
/// move first
-2nd
 if O is at center:
#expected:8
10 100020000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000
	if next O is at corner:
#expected:2
10 100020201 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000

 if O is not at center:
     if O is at edge
#expected:6
10 120000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000
#expected:2
10 100200000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000
#expected:2
10 100000020 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000
#expected:6
10 100002000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000


     if O is at corner
#expected:2
10 100000200 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000
#expected:2
10 100000002 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000
#expected:6
10 102000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000




/// move second
-1st
 if opponent moves on corner:
#expected:4
10 200000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000
#expected:4
10 000000200 000000000 010000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000
 	then you go to edge 
#expected:1
10 200010200 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000
 if opponent moves on center:
#expected:0
10 000200000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000
 if opponent moves on edge:
#expected:0 or 6
10 000200000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000
#expected:18 or 20
22 000000000 000000000 010000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000
#expected:6 or 8
10 000000020 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000
	then you go center
#expected:4
10 100200020 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000


check
random number generation (if, else)


/// check winning
------------------- we are winning
#expected:2
10 110020020 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000
#expected:29
23 000000000 000000000 000000000 100102012 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000
#expected:74
18 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000210120

------------------- opponent is winning
#expected:10
21 000000000 200010012 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000
#expected:54 #56
16 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 022010100 000000000 002102102

21 000201010 200012012 002210000 000000000 000210001 010002000 011100002 000102000 000000000

14 000000000 000000000 000001000 000000000 000000000 000000020 000000000 000000000 000000000

12 000000000 000000000 000000000 000001000 000000000 002000000 000000000 000000000 000000000
13 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000 000000000


12 022002200 101000000 102100100 002001000 000000000 022001000 100000002 000000000 100000000

19 212002021 100202000 102100100 000001122 000000000 120100100 202002000 111000020 001002000

15 212002021 100202000 102100100 000001122 000000000 120100100 202002000 111000020 001002000
